name: dfs.client.key.provider.cache.expiry
description: DFS client security key cache expiration in milliseconds.

name: dfs.webhdfs.netty.low.watermark
description: Low watermark configuration to Netty for Datanode WebHdfs.

name: nfs.wtmax
description:
This is the maximum size in bytes of a WRITE request
    supported by the NFS gateway. If you change this, make sure you
    also update the nfs mount's wsize(add wsize= # of bytes to the 
    mount directive).

name: dfs.namenode.max-corrupt-file-blocks-returned
description:
The maximum number of corrupt file blocks listed by NameNode Web UI,
      JMX and other client request.

name: yarn.app.mapreduce.am.resource.cpu-vcores
description: The number of virtual CPU cores the MR AppMaster needs.

name: dfs.block.access.key.update.interval
description: Interval in minutes at which namenode updates its access keys.

name: dfs.datanode.restart.replica.expiration
description:
During shutdown for restart, the amount of time in seconds budgeted for
    datanode restart.
